General_Description: '''Out of Here''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Rumors say [[Athens|Athenian]] [[Strategos|Strategoi]] hire [[Mercenary|bounty hunters]] to decimate [[Sparta|our]] ranks. Send them a message to stop them."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Athenian [[Marksman|marksmen]], strategoi, and [[Nation Leader|leaders]] all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
